data.title: Sigma Pi Fraternity
data.text:
About the Organization

The Epsilon Rho Chapter of Sigma Pi Fraternity is a group of men constantly working to achieve excellence in our primary ideals: scholarship, leadership, and service.

Meetings

Sigma Pi Fraternity meets once a week on Sundays at 6:30 p.m. in the Sigma Pi House.

How to Join

Men interested in joining our chapter may go through fall or spring recruitment. Contact the Student Activities Office for more information.

Local Website: www.drurysigmapi.com

National Website: www.sigmapi.org

Group President

Chapter Facts

Nickname: Sig Pi

Colors: Lavender, White, and Gold

Flower: Lavender Orchid

Symbols: Emerald and Owl

National Philanthropy: Donate Life and Amazing Day Foundation

Local Philanthropy: Harmony House

Place and Date of Founding: Vincennes University, February 26, 1897

Founded at Drury: 1982

At a Glance
